rules: Be respectful to all members of the chatroom.

No hate speech or bullying. Make sure everyone feels safe. Bullying of any kind isn't allowed, and degrading comments about things like race, religion, culture, sexual orientation, gender or identity will not be tolerated.
Keep conversations relevant to the stream content. Spamming or off-topic chats will be moderated.
No self-promotion or advertising other channels/websites without permission.
Avoid sharing personal information, both yours and others.
Do not spread false information or rumors.
Follow the platform's terms of service at all times.
response.enforcement: Violations of the rules may result in a timeout or a ban from the chatroom at the moderators' discretion.
